CreateCloudDBInstances.document: This example shows you how to create a dual-server high-availability instance based on the general cloud disk.
CreateCloudDBInstances.input: POST / HTTP/1.1Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.comContent-Type: application/jsonX-TC-Action: CreateCloudDBInstances<common request parameters>{    "Zone": "ap-guangzhou-3",    "InstanceChargeType": "PREPAID",    "ProjectId": 0,    "Memory": 4,    "Storage": 200,    "GoodsNum": 1,    "SubnetId": "subnet-15y3y4eo",    "VpcId": "vpc-hqxhp43z",    "Period": 1,    "DBVersion": "2008R2",    "AutoRenewFlag": 0,    "SecurityGroupList": [        "sg-7hb0hisl"    ],    "Weekly": [        1,        2    ],    "StartTime": "01:00",    "Span": 1,    "MultiZones": true,    "ResourceTags": [        {            "TagKey": "env",            "TagValue": "product"        }    ],    "Cpu": 2,    "MachineType": "CLOUD_BSSD",    "Collation": "Chinese_PRC_CI_AS",    "TimeZone": "China Standard Time"}
CreateCloudDBInstances.title: Creating an instance

DescribeBackupCommand.document:
This example shows you how to query the command to create a full backup and an incremental transaction log backup when you need to import the incremental transaction log backup. The full backup created does not need to be restored.
\\\\n in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the Command of Creating a Full Backup

DescribeBackupCommand.document:
This example shows you how to obtain the recovered incremental backup of transaction logs by this API when an incremental import of transaction logs is needed.
\\\\n in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the Command of Creating an Incremental Transaction Log Backup

DescribeBackupCommand.document: This example shows you how to obtain the full backup without recovery by this API when an incremental import of transaction logs is needed.\\\\n in the command means a line feed.
DescribeBackupCommand.title: Querying the Command of Creating a Full Backup and an Incremental Transaction Log Backup

POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json

        "2"
    ],
    "InstanceId": "mssql-rdc0gajn",
    "Limit": "100",
    "OrderByType": "desc",
    "BackupFileName": "db1",
    "RecoveryType": "FULL"
}

ModifyAccountPrivilege.title: Modifying instance account permissions

ModifyBackupMigration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBackupMigration
<Common request parameters>

{
    "BackupMigrationId": "mssql-backup-migration-kpl74n9l",
    "InstanceId": "mssql-rdc0gajn",
    "UploadType": "COS_UPLOAD",
    "BackupFiles": [
        "db1.bak"
    ],
    "MigrationName": "character string",
    "RecoveryType": "FULL"
}
ModifyBackupMigration.title: Modifying a full backup import task

ModifyBackupStrategy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyBackupStrategy
<Common request parameters>

{
    "BackupTime": "14",
    "InstanceId": "mssql-j8kv137v",
    "RegularBackupCounts": "1",
    "BackupSaveDays": "7",
    "BackupDay": "1",
    "RegularBackupSaveDays": "365",
    "BackupType": "daily",
    "RegularBackupEnable": "enable",
    "RegularBackupStrategy": "month",
    "RegularBackupStartTime": "2022-10-10"
}
ModifyBackupStrategy.title: Modifying the backup policy of the "mssql-j8kv137v" instance

ModifyDBEncryptAttributes.document: This example shows you how to enable or disable TDE of a database.

ModifyDBInstanceNetwork.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDBInstanceNetwork
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "mssql-e720ieef",
    "NewVpcId": "vpc-kw88teud",
    "NewSubnetId": "subnet-8z5n8tcg",
    "OldIpRetainTime": "0"
}
ModifyDBInstanceNetwork.title: Network Change

ModifyDBInstanceProject.title: Modifying the project to which the instance belongs

ModifyDReadable.document: This example shows you how to enable or disable the read-only feature of the replica server by this API.
ModifyDReadable.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyDReadable
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "mssql-j8kv137v",
    "Type": "enable",
    "VpcId": "vpc-jh8ah7",
    "SubnetId": "sub-i90aoa",
    "Vip": "127.0.0.1"
}
ModifyDReadable.title: Enabling or Disabling the Read-Only Feature of the Replica Server

ModifyInstanceEncryptAttributes.document: This example shows you how to enable TDE of an instance.
ModifyInstanceEncryptAttributes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ModifyInstanceEncryptAttributes
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "mssql-njj2mtpl",
    "CertificateAttribution": "self",
    "QuoteUin": ""
}
ModifyInstanceEncryptAttributes.title: Enabling TDE of an instance

ModifyInstanceParam.input:
https://sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com/?Action=ModifyInstanceParam
&WaitSwitch=0
&InstanceIds.0=mssql-bm5e51kb
&InstanceIds.1=mssql-p2yli7gv
&InstanceIds.2=mssql-9ahw2qp9
&ParamList.0.Name=fill factor(%)
&ParamList.0.CurrentValue=50
&ParamList.1.Name=cost threshold for parallelism
&ParamList.1.CurrentValue=0
&<Common request parameters>
ModifyInstanceParam.title: Modifying instance parameters

RestoreInstance.document: This example shows you how to roll back the database by backup set.
RestoreInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: sqlserver.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RestoreInstance
<Common request parameters>

{
    "InstanceId": "mssql-u81902ja",
    "BackupId": 0,
    "TargetInstanceId": "mssql-u8190212",
    "RenameRestore": [
        {
            "OldName": "test_db",
            "NewName": "new_db"
        }
    ],
    "GroupId": ""
}
RestoreInstance.title: Rolling back the database by backup set
